title: Interpretation of seeing a sorcerer and sorcerer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a magician and a magician in a dream We examine with you through this topic the interpretation of seeing a magician and a magician in a dream in the presence of many people who believe in sorcery and magic, especially since it was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an despite the presence of some types of sorcery, which is just a trick of magicians. Through these lines, we present to you the interpretation of seeing magicians and charlatans in dreams and dreams according to the interpretations of Muhammad bin Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a magician in a dream There are many interpretations of seeing a magician and a witch in a dream, and most of the visions are interpreted as evil and harming the seer, and they can be illusions and turn into doubts later, and they are all wrong and lead to the dreamer. Regret in the future. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees a magician or a magician hitting him or denying him indicates that good is coming to him, and whoever sees that magic is descending is evidence of good for him or the invalidity of the vision. And the dream of decoding magic bodes well. As for whoever sees that there is someone who solves magic for him in a dream with spells, this indicates the corruption of the dreamer's morals and morals, and the dreamer himself solves magic in a dream. His life.. As for the one who saw that it was present, he broke the spell and was healed, and this indicates that this person returned to God and repented sincerely. And whoever saw a magician or a magician in a dream indicates the presence of a wicked and lying person in his life, and the magician in the vision resembles the devil, and whoever saw a sheikh or a magician spreading gossip to people, this is evidence of his presence. From those who led you astray in religion. And there is another interpretation, which is arrogance of the heart and vanity, and this is if the dreamer saw that he was talking to a magician, and seeing a magician in a dream is a sign that you must seek forgiveness. If a person sees himself in a dream that he has become a magician and does not resort to bad deeds, this indicates the status and reputation of that person and that good is coming to him. And whoever destroys you with evil, and whoever sees that he controls people, he has shown his position among people. The dream of a magician in a dream, and whoever sees that there is a witch chasing him despite her knowledge and desire to harm him, this indicates that the owner of the vision will cause evil and evil. As for whoever sees in his dream a bewitched person, this indicates that the person has abandoned his religion and distanced himself from God and his constant pursuit of evil and corruption. According to Ibn Sirin's interpretations, the bewitched in a dream is nothing but injustice to his family, wife and children in reality, or from those who follow Satan and call for corruption on earth. Interpretation of seeing a magician for an unmarried and married woman If an unmarried woman sees a magician in a dream, this means that there are corrupt and liars in her life. , But he cannot fix it. Seeing a married woman with magic in a dream indicates ignorance and lack of skill in life affairs. So we may have reached the end of our article on the interpretation of seeing a magician and a magician in a dream, and we hope that we have benefited you and provided you with all the information and interpretations about the dream of a magician in a single dream. And the dream got married.

Seeing a married woman with magic in a dream indicates ignorance and lack of ingenuity in life’s affairs. Therefore, we may have reached the end of our article on the interpretation of seeing a magician and a sorcerer in a dream. We hope that we have benefited you and provided you with all the information and interpretations about the dream. The magician in one dream. And I married the dream.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on the leg?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a snake bite on one’s legInterpretation of a dream of a snake bite on one’s legSeeing snakes and their presence in dreams is one of the horrific things that worry dreamers and makes them search for a visual explanation.Snake bite in a dreamIf a person sees a snake trying to bite him, the dream indicates that he will face problems that may hinder his work, but God It will quickly get him out of the snake and release his worries. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on his leg - whichInterpretation of a dream about a snake bite on his legThe dream is evidence of fierce competition between a person and the enemy, which will bring him many problems and worries. A snake bite on the leg indicates a serious illness or even death. It can That the snake indicates a feeling of guilt and deviation from God, as you see that it does not deserve praise or explanation, so this could be a warning message from God and we must point to God. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on one girl’s legIf the unmarried girl finds a snake that attacks her and bites her in the Her dream, it means that she will be deterred and commit immorality and adultery voluntarily. If an unmarried girl finds that a snake is living on her leg and does not feel pain, it means that she is ready to commit adultery instead of imposing it on him, but obtaining her consent. The only girl who saw a snake biting her twice in her dream , indicated that God will stand by her side to defeat and defeat the enemy. If a girl sees herself killing a snake in her dream, this means that she is a good girl who adheres to the teachings of the Islamic religion. If an unmarried girl dreams of a snake attacking her and then biting her, this means that there is someone who hates her and is jealous of her. He doesn't want her to be happy and will do everything in his power to hurt and destroy her. . Bite. A girl’s dream of a black snake in her dream is considered to be her awakening to reconsider her romantic relationship, because she must remain vigilant and careful, and not leave her heart and emotions behind and choose her future husband. Consult your thoughts on issues, make decisions based on the right basis and not on your heart, and play The right role so that she does not regret it later. If an unmarried girl sees a snake hanging around her neck, this means that the girl will be in a hurry and must be very careful and vigilant to protect herself. Snake bite in a man’s dreamWhen a person sees a snake in a dream, this indicates That the person with insight has suffered from many problems and fears, and perhaps many envious people. The interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on his leg. In a dream, a man shows many sins and may go to a forbidden place. A person’s fear of a snake in his dream reflects the sleeper’s character and inability To face life's problems. Snake attacks on men or women are considered one of the most unpleasant visions that threaten their lives, and men may fall into problems that they cannot escape from. A person who talks to a snake in a dream proves that he will get a lot of money during this period and may get married. A beautiful girl with a strong personality. Interpretation of seeing a snake biting his leg in a dream for a married woman. If the married woman finds

title: More than 50 interesting interpretations of seeing a black horse in a dream

preview.html: A black horse in a dream A black horse in a dream is one of the visions that causes fear and anxiety for many people, because the black horse conveys a message of panic to the forerunner. A black horse is rarely found in reality. Sufficient answers to the interpretation of a dream about a black horse in a dream, and many dream interpretation scholars have worked hard to interpret this vision, but they differed greatly, and this difference arose as a result of the situation in which the black horse was seen in a dream, and the matter also differed depending on the priest, seeing a woman is not... Married is not the same as seeing a married woman. Their vision is different from that of a pregnant woman and a man, but in most interpretations, seeing a horse or a horse is generally considered a good omen for the fortuneteller. Because the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - said: The horse is bound with goodness in its feet... “Whenever he finds a horse, he finds many good things that are not considered good. Full details of a dream about a black horse in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse: The horse is considered one of the animals closest to humans because it is the most useful animal for humans. However, horses today are no longer considered an important means of transporting people from one place to another, as new means of transportation have overwhelmed humans. . It has become more widely used than other media used in recent days. Dreaming of a horse in a dream indicates pride, dignity, and dominance, and seeing a horse in general in a dream is an indication of money and survival. A horse in a dream also means domineering, dignity, and pride. Whoever sees that he is riding a horse and tries to stop it means He is guilty and may be wrong of his own accord, and you may be wrong in his rights. From others. His right will be forgiven, and the right of others will not be forgiven except with the consent of the person concerned and his forgiveness and forgiveness, otherwise this debt will remain hanging around his neck until the Day of Resurrection. That the Almighty God will inherit the earth and those on it. Whoever sees a horse from afar will find goodness. Everyone who rides a highly decorated horse enjoys a high degree of honor and honesty. If a horse dies in a dream, this is evidence of the fortuneteller’s loss. If a person sees the horse as if it is objecting to it, then this It indicates a conflict between the fortuneteller and someone. Drinking horse milk means that the fortuneteller has greatness and chivalry. Anyone who sees himself riding a horse means that he will work with a high-ranking person. If the horse accelerates during the race, it means that the fortuneteller’s ambitions will come true. If the dreamer sees A horse is killed in a dream, it means that he gains money, honor, grace and power. If you see horses passing in front of you for your comfort and consolation. If you see a horse running away with other horses, this may indicate the illness of some friends. Seeing beautiful horses indicates prosperity and an extravagant life. Watching a foal indicates the illness of some friends. On harmony between spouses and lack of jealousy. Seeing a horse riding means that you are on the path of great wealth flowing into your hands. Watching a black horse in a dream is evidence of a change in life for the better, but with a lot of fatigue. Watching a brown horse indicates an increase in one’s wealth. And satisfying it for amateurs. Seeing a horse in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a human being

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we show you the interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream, according to what was interpreted by Imam Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of this is a vision and they do not know what its meaning is. Dream interpretation scholars said that the interpretation of a dream about a cat varies according to the condition of the sleeper, as it differs according to the shape of the cat. The cat that came to him in a dream, and in the following paragraphs we present to you through the interpretive encyclopedia of seeing a cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a male cat in a dream is not a good vision and indicates the presence of traitors in the life of the dreamer. The cat indicates A male in a dream also indicates bad luck in life and the inability to achieve dreams. As for a white cat in a dream, it indicates the good news that the dreamer will receive, and it also indicates success and superiority. A white cat in a dream also indicates the presence of loyal friends in the sleeper’s life. Hearing the sound of cats in a dream indicates that God will help the dreamer achieve his goals in life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is selling cats, this is a sign that he will face a major financial loss. Seeing eating cat meat in a dream means that the dreamer is following magic. If The dreamer saw in a dream that he was killing a black cat, so this is a sign that he will get rid of haters and envious people in his life. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin said that seeing a cat in a dream indicates gossip, gossip, and bad morals. Seeing cats in a dream also indicates To the presence of hypocrites in the sleeper's life. And if the sleeper sees in his sleep a cat giving birth to many kittens, this is a sign that great sustenance and kindness will come to him in his coming days, but sometimes this vision indicates the presence of magic and envy. The life of the sleeper is committed to reading the Holy Qur’an and fortifying the house of his demons. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that a cat in a man’s or woman’s dream indicates the presence of betrayal between spouses, as well as the presence of cunning in the life of the dreamer. Seeing cats in a dream sometimes indicates the presence of a quarrel. Between people or the divorce of spouses. A black cat in a dream indicates the presence of people trying to harm the dreamer. Seeing black cats sometimes indicates the presence of someone trying to harm the sleeper with magic, so it is necessary to take into account the recitation of dhikr and the protection of the verses of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream For a single woman, Ibn Sirin believes that the presence of a cat in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of some evil people in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a cat is attacking her, this indicates the presence of someone who is trying to harm and harm her. If a single girl dreams of a black cat, this is a sign of The presence of a person in her life who is jealous of her, and this vision may indicate that she has deceived those around her. A white cat in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of goodness in her life. If she sees cats, this is a sign that good news will come to her in the coming days. And seeing an unmarried girl A married woman in her dream running away from cats is evidence of her fear of the future and her deep anxiety

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about white and black bread, buying bread in a dream, and receiving and giving bread in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breadInterpretation of a dream about bread Bread is not only the basis of food on most tables, but it has multiple benefits and nutrients, so the interpretation of a dream about bread carries many good interpretations, as well as indicating future events, personal qualities, and many other interpretations. Now we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about white and black bread. What is the interpretation of a dream about bread? Some commentators suggest that bread symbolizes education and love of culture, and that the dreamer is one of the personalities who considers science a goal and goal in life. It also expresses the degree of a person’s religiosity according to the amount of bread Which he eats, so if he sees small bites, then he is weak in faith and vice versa. While the vision of making bread with flour is evidence of the dreamer’s striving for strength, steadfastness, and determination for his goal, and maintaining his mastery of his work and patience to enable him to achieve his goal. But if a person sees himself eating a whole loaf in Ecstasy and happiness, as this indicates a person who is content with a contented soul who does not desire or look at what is in the hands of others. Buying bread expresses the approaching of a happy occasion for the fortuneteller, as he is attending a happy occasion and being the most important member of it. But if a person offers bread to his father and he refuses, this expresses This dreamer’s misbehavior, and the violation of some of the principles, rules, and traditions upon which he grew up. As for selling bread to people in the streets, it is evidence of spreading sermons and wisdom to everyone and a desire to enlighten people’s minds and support them for a better future. The Egyptian website is the largest dream interpretation website in the Arab world, what You only have to type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about bread by Ibn SirinBread in a dream by Ibn Sirin is often associated with the material affairs of the dreamer or his field of work and the source of income from which he obtains his daily bread. If the dreamer eats half a loaf of bread, this A sign that he will enter into a business with another person and will have a profitable business with them that will bring them profit and profit. Also, preparing the dough indicates that the dreamer is searching for work that will bring him luxury and a decent living in proportion to his creative abilities and skills. As for the small bread crumbs, it is evidence that we We are facing some difficult financial crises and feel unable to pay the costs of living. What is the interpretation of a dream about bread for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about bread for single womenBread in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the abundance of goodness, blessings and blessings that the girl will receive in the coming period in exchange for her good intentions and tolerance in dealing with People. It is also considered one of the visions that indicate that she will find a job that matches her skills in which she excels over her colleagues and is suitable for improving her living conditions. Also, finding bread crumbs in the streets represents facing some difficulties and exhaustion in life in the coming days, and some may try to harm her. But if she sees herself making bread in the oven, this indicates that she is doing everything in her power to achieve this goal that she has sought so much. If the young man gets a good life, this is an indication that there is a wealthy young man

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing the stairs of a mosque

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of climbing the mosque stairs in a dream is interpreted, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of the dream of climbing the mosque stairs in a dream: Climbing the mosque stairs in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever dreams that he is climbing the stairs may It indicates that there are some obstacles in his life that stand in the way of his dreams. Seeing yourself climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate that you are moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and need to repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. Dreaming of climbing the tower of the mosque in a dream may be a sign Bad changes will occur in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was able to climb to a very high place, could be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. A dream about climbing a high place may be... The dream is a sign of the effort and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his ambitions. If a person sees himself climbing high in a dream, this may indicate that he will get what he wants during this period. If a person sees that he has climbed to a high place, it may indicate the abundance of goodness and tremendous livelihood. Which the dreamer will receive during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an elevator in a dream: If someone sees himself climbing an elevator, this may indicate good changes that are occurring in his life during this time. A person’s dream that he was climbing an elevator may indicate the ease and comfort that Enjoy it at that time. Seeing climbing the escalator in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be achieved easily during this period. Seeing the elevator going up in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to it during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of climbing the stairs in Dream: Climbing the stairs in a dream may mean achieving goals and ambitions during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of climbing the stairs of an airplane in a dream may indicate closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding sins and disobedience. In the event that someone saw that he was climbing the stairs of an airplane, this may indicate Positive changes occur in his life during those days. Dreaming of climbing the stairs in a dream can indicate joyful changes and control over difficult life circumstances, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs with difficulty in a dream: Climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate the dreamer’s suffering in his life during those days. Any Someone who dreams of climbing the stairs with difficulty indicates difficulty that the dreamer may suffer from during those days. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate severe pain and sadness that the dreamer will face during that period. When one sees that he was climbing the stairs with difficulty, it may indicate This is due to the severity and lightness of the time that the dreamer suffers from in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an ice mountain in a dream: If someone saw that he was climbing an ice mountain, this may indicate the dreamer’s good fortune. A dream about climbing an ice mountain may indicate happy events that Speak to the dreamer at that time. Visions may indicate

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering and leaving the bathroom by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of entering and exiting the bathroom by Ibn Sirin Entering and exiting the bathroom is one of the dreams in which the dreamer feels tense and fearful when he sees it in a dream, as it carries many different connotations and interpretations, some of which indicate the end of problems and crises, and some of them show problems and fears. What is the interpretation of a dream of entering The bathroom and getting out of it? Seeing a bathroom in a dream is one of the dreams that has many meanings. When a married man dreams of building a new bathroom, this is evidence of a promotion at work or moving to another job. And seeing a man in a dream tearing down the old bathroom of the house, even though it is new. If a woman sees in a dream that she enters the bathroom and washes herself until she prays, this is evidence of kindness and nourishment for her, and when a woman enters the bathroom and comes out with her child, this is evidence of an end. A problem she was dealing with in her life. Entering the toilet for an unmarried young man is an expression of the approaching marriage. As for seeing an ugly toilet entering the bathroom, it is a sign of marriage. As for a woman with bad morals and a strong tongue, this is a must. Be careful and be careful with your choice. Seeing an abandoned bathroom is an unpleasant vision that indicates stumbling and an inability to achieve goals, and indicates exposure to psychological pressures and serious problems. As for seeing a toilet in the bathroom, it is evidence of escaping worries, problems, and debt expenses. Seeing a full toilet expresses Revealing secrets or indicating the dreamer’s bad reputation or committing many sins and disobedience, and he must repent and ask for forgiveness and return to God. Entering the toilet for a man with someone he knows is a sign of friendly and healthy relations between this person and the dreamer, and it also indicates that they will soon enter into an investment plan And they make a lot of profits. What is the interpretation of entering and exiting the bathroom according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing entering and exiting the bathroom according to Ibn Sirin in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the fulfillment of a long-standing desire, but if she sees herself entering the bathroom with a stranger she does not know, this is evidence of that. . That there is an inappropriate person in her life and she will communicate with him soon, but she discovers his truth and breaks up with him. Seeing a girl in a dream that she is entering and leaving the bathroom means that she is distinguished by purity and chastity, and seeing the bathroom being cleaned is evidence that she will soon travel to a beautiful place that she has always wanted to travel to. He says Ibn Sirin said that the vision of entering and exiting the bathroom represents salvation from worries and problems. Entering the toilet without being able to defecate or shower means that the dreamer is suffering from many problems in his life or that he is living a life that does not suit him and wants to change his life but does not know how. Seeing the green dove It is a praiseworthy vision that expresses a lot of goodness and nourishment, and the vision shows the married man that he will have many children, while the yellow dove portends illness and misfortunes. What is the interpretation of dreams about entering and exiting the bathroom for single women? Interpretation of dreams about entering the bathroom

title: Interpretation of kiss in a dream

preview.html: Does the interpretation of kissing in a dream indicate anything? In fact, kissing is one of the things that express love and feelings, and indicates the presence of emotion, but in a dream does it appear the same thing or is it different? Kissing has different meanings that differ from one person to another, and according to the emotion and feeling that dominates the sleeper in his sleep, and here are more details Through the encyclopedia.Interpretation of a kiss in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of a kiss in a dreamIbn Sirin says that a kiss in a dream shows love and feelings and that a person needs affection in general. If someone sees in a dream kissing people, this is evidence that this person wants to aspire to know A lot about the details of his personal life. But the matter varies relatively according to the symbols, signs, and indications in the dream, as follows: Interpretation of a kiss by someone you know. If a man sees that he is kissing his wife and she is satisfied with him, then this is a sign of love between them and an increase in passion. And if he sees that he is kissing his wife, but he does not He is satisfied with her, this indicates a widening gap between the spouses and a lack of affection. If one sees that he is accepting his employer, this is evidence of his friendship on the part of the employer to gain his interests and that he will easily fulfill each of the requirements. If one sees that he is receiving his enemy, this indicates reconciliation between them. A kiss in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the person she loves is kissing her, then this is evidence of their marriage, and if she sees that the work manager kissed her, then this is evidence that she will get a promotion or great fame and morals, and this is a strong message to avoid the topic and stay away from it. And if An unmarried woman sees that someone is kissing her on the cheek, then this is evidence that he has advised her, and she must take it. And if he kisses him, this indicates his reward. If she sees in a dream that someone is kissing her neck, then this is evidence of debts and distress, but this distress will soon go away. If she sees that she is kissing her parents’ neck, this is evidence of her obedience to them and her kindness to them. When an unmarried girl dreams that there is a stranger kissing her without desire, this dream indicates that the unmarried woman will receive a lot of money, money, or help. But if The kiss was with desire, then this indicates that he will get money, but this money is forbidden. And if a dead person kisses it, he will obtain benefits from that deceased person, money and property. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s kiss in a dream: If a married woman sees that her husband is kissing him, this is evidence On her husband’s love for her. And if she sees that a relative kissed her, this means that she wants to thank her for something. If a stranger kisses her, this means that she will get into trouble. If she kisses her children, this is evidence of her love for her children. A man kisses a man in a dreamIf a man kisses A man in a dream without desire, then this indicates trade and speculation, but if he is with desire, then it means satisfying a need, and kissing a friend on the mouth indicates the invitation of the unseen or hidden. A good deed, and from his friend on his neck or cheek, he will pay him a favor.

Good, and from his friend on his neck or cheek pays him a favor.

preview.html: Do you want to control the thoughts of your subconscious mind while you sleep, in this article from your website gptafser.com/ we look at some methods that may help you in how to control your dreams. Record the dreams that you want to repeat in the dream Start by purchasing a notebook that will make it special for the dreams that you have You want to repeat it again in a dream so that you always remember it. Put this small notebook next to the bed and put a pen next to it to write down the dream. As soon as you wake up from your sleep so that time does not pass and then you forget it. Modern dream recording mechanisms can be used, but psychologists prefer to write the dream by hand. Therefore The memory can be recorded whenever you spend time writing it down on the pages of a notebook. This method gives the mind an opportunity to record your dream. See also: Do ​​dreams come true after sunrise? Mindfulness Training Every night, start reading the dream that you wrote before sleep in a sufficient manner and concentration so that the mind records it well. When you read the dream every night, your mind begins to recognize the words you wrote with your hand. The feeling begins when you feel the words you wrote before you fell asleep. After that, lie in bed and think about the dream that you want to repeat again and think carefully about its details. Think about the dream as you Awake so you can repeat it in the dream through the subconscious mind. To help you create images associated with the dream you want, repeat the images associated with the dream in your mind. Don't forget the sounds you heard in the dream, start thinking about them and listen to them carefully. So that the mind can feel and feel them With it. If a person cannot repeat these repeated sounds in his dream, he goes back to the notebook and reads it again. Travel in your mind to the details of the dream from your point of view and begin to know the details of your dream from your point of view. Help yourself to relax and not stress. When you go to sleep , think about the details of your dream and the voices in your head and also record them when you wake up. Control your dreams During sleep, you need to check your reality and ask yourself whether you are in reality or in a dream, your mind will answer you while you sleep. Perceive reality because there is a difference between dream and reality, In the dream things become liquid. But in reality they remain the same. In the dream, the words, time and color have changed. But in reality everything remains the same. To make sure that you are in reality and not in a dream, look at the posters in your room if you look at them. And make sure From seeing it, you are awake and when seeing the text is different, you are in the dream, that is, you are living the dream. Continue to make sure that you are in the dream until your abilities begin to control your dreams. When you feel like you are in a dream, you begin to calm down, so that you do not wake up in the wrong way. When you are motivated to prove to yourself that you can control your dream. Read also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, the letter Tha’ Useful tips for controlling your dreams When you doubt that you are dreaming, start counting your fingers, then you will feel that you cannot count them. Record the date and time that you dreamed about, whether In the present or future.You know the people who were
